text.sentence: susie q, how are you?????? i hope that all is well.
i have been meaning to call you for ages.
ect, etc, etc??? clay and i are doing well.
we are half way through our summer of working and being wined and dined.
we eat a lot!!! we are living in my parents' garage apt--needless to say, the summer has been a little crazy!!
i know clay sent you an email at the beginning of the summer, but i just wanted to remind you that we are going to the lake (LBJ) next weekend.
i am sure you are super busy, but i'd love to see you if you get a chance!!
lisa and brad and jen and matt are coming and eddie is going to come for a little bit on saturday, i think!! i will try to call asap---
